communications.title: MAJOR EVENT CONSULTATION
communications.description: This huge free street festival celebrates the best things in life – FOOD, WINE and ARTS – right in the heart of Sydney. The festival is held on Circular Quay & in the Rocks, a few meter away from the iconic Sydney Opera House, Harbour Bridge and the Museum of Contemporary Arts.
